overview.en: GPB is the platform token adopted by Americamall.ca. Americomall.ca is a cross-border e-commerce platform invested and created by Polar Bear Canada Corp. and uses blockchain as the underlying technology support. GPB is generated by exchanges mining and consumption mining at Americamall.ca. It will support product traceability information query, user information confirmation and other financial attributes in Americomall.ca.
overview.zh: GPB是Americomall.ca北美商城所采用的平台通证。Americomall.ca北美商城是Polar Bear Canada Corp.（加拿大极地熊集团）投资创建的釆用区块链作为底层技术支持的跨境电商平台。GPB由交易所和商城消费挖矿产生，它将在Americomall.ca中支持产品溯源信息查询，用户信息确权使用及其他金融属性的功能
